text: Cesare Previti (born 21 October 1934) is an Italian politician and convicted criminal. He was a close ally to Silvio Berlusconi. In November 2003, Previti was sentenced to five years in jail due to his bribing of judges. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Italian criminals Category:Politicians from Calabria Category:People from Reggio Calabria
title: Cesare Previti
